info.title: MegiLance API
info.description: MegiLance backend API - A comprehensive freelancing platform with AI-powered features and blockchain-based payments

schema.title: Response Live Api Health Live Get
Response Ready Api Health Ready Get

post.description:
Register a new user

Creates a new user account in Turso database.

User login endpoint with 2FA support

If user has 2FA enabled, returns requires_2fa=True and a temporary token.
Refresh access token using refresh token
Initialize 2FA setup for the current user
Enable 2FA after setup by verifying a TOTP token
Complete login with 2FA verification
Disable 2FA for current user (requires password confirmation)
Regenerate backup codes (invalidates old codes)
Verify user's email address using token from email
Resend email verification link to current user
Initiate password reset flow
Reset password using token from email
Validate a password reset token without using it

get.description:
Get WebSocket server status

Returns information about active connections, users, and rooms.

Get list of online users

Returns user IDs of all currently connected users.
Check if a specific user is online

Send a test notification to a user (for testing WebSocket)

Admin/testing endpoint to verify WebSocket functionality.

By default shows current user's skills.

post.description: Create a new contract

delete.description: Delete a contract (soft delete by setting status to cancelled)

post.description: Create a direct hire contract (creates project -> proposal -> contract)
Create a new milestone for a contract. Only the contract client can create milestones.

get.description: Get a specific milestone. Only contract parties can view.

patch.description: Update a milestone. Only the client can update milestones that aren't submitted yet.

delete.description: Delete a milestone. Only client can delete, and only if not yet submitted.

post.description: Submit a milestone for approval (freelancer action).
Approve a milestone (client action). Triggers payment creation.
Reject a milestone submission (client action). Returns milestone to PENDING status.

List all scope change requests for a specific contract.

Reject a scope change request.
Cancel a scope change request. Must be done by the requester.

post.description:
Create a new review.

Business rules:
- Only contract parties (client or freelancer) can review
- Cannot review yourself
- One review per party per contract
- Contract must be completed

schema.title: Response Create Review Api Reviews Reviews Post

get.description:
List reviews with filtering.

Only public reviews are visible unless you're:
- The reviewer
- The reviewed user
- An admin

schema.title: Response List Reviews Api Reviews Reviews Get

get.description:
Get aggregated review statistics for a user.

Only includes public reviews in stats.

schema.title: Response Get Review Stats Api Reviews Reviews Stats  User Id  Get

get.description:
Get a specific review.

Private reviews only visible to reviewer, reviewed user, or admin.

schema.title: Response Get Review Api Reviews Reviews  Review Id  Get

patch.description:
Update a review.

Only the reviewer can update their review.

schema.title: Response Update Review Api Reviews Reviews  Review Id  Patch

delete.description:
Delete a review.

Only reviewer or admin can delete.

post.description: Create a new dispute. Only contract parties can raise disputes.

get.description: List disputes with filtering. Regular users see only disputes they're involved in.
Get a specific dispute. Only viewable by contract parties and admins.

patch.description: Update a dispute. Regular users can only update description, admins can update everything.

post.description: Assign a dispute to an admin. Admin-only endpoint.
Resolve a dispute. Admin-only endpoint.

parameters.name: contract_status

schema.description: New status for the contract (e.g., active, terminated, completed)
schema.title: Contract Status

parameters.description: New status for the contract (e.g., active, terminated, completed)

post.description: Upload evidence for a dispute. Only contract parties and admins can upload.

get.description: List payments for the authenticated user with optional filters.

schema.title: Response List Payments Api Payments  Get

post.description: Create a new payment record.

get.description: Get a specific payment by ID.

put.description: Update a payment (admin or payment creator only).

post.description: Mark a payment as completed.

get.description: Get payment statistics for the current user.

post.description:
Create a Stripe customer

Creates a customer in Stripe for the current user.
Customer ID should be stored in user profile for future payments.

Create a payment intent

Creates a Stripe payment intent for processing payments.
Use capture_method='manual' for escrow (held funds).
Confirm a payment intent

Capture a payment intent (release escrow)

Used for manual capture payments (escrow).
Call this when work is approved to release funds to freelancer.
Cancel a payment intent

Create a refund

Refunds a payment partially or fully.
Attach a payment method to a customer
Create a subscription for platform fees

Handle Stripe webhook events

This endpoint receives events from Stripe (payment success/failure, etc.)
Webhook signing secret must be configured in settings.

get.description: List portfolio items for a user

schema.title: Response List Portfolio Items Api Portfolio  Get

post.description: Create a new portfolio item (JSON)

schema.title: Response Create Portfolio Item Api Portfolio  Post
Response Get Portfolio Item Api Portfolio  Portfolio Item Id  Get
Response Update Portfolio Item Api Portfolio  Portfolio Item Id  Put

post.description: Create a new portfolio item from wizard (multipart/form-data)

schema.title: Response Create Portfolio Item Wizard Api Portfolio Items Post

get.description: Get current wallet balance with breakdown
Get wallet transaction history with filters

schema.title: Response Get Transaction History Api Wallet Transactions Get

post.description: Request a withdrawal from available balance
Initiate a deposit to wallet
Configure automatic payout schedule

Start a new time entry (start timer)
- Freelancers can track time on their contracts
- Auto-sets start_time if not provided
- Status defaults to 'draft'

get.description:
List time entries with filters
- Freelancers see only their own entries
- Clients see entries for their contracts
- Supports filtering by contract, status, date range

schema.title: Response List Time Entries Api Time Entries  Get

put.description:
Stop a running time entry (stop timer)
- Auto-calculates duration and amount
- Sets end_time to current time if not provided

get.description:
Get time entry summary for a contract
- Total hours worked
- Total billable hours
- Total amount earned
- Number of entries
Get a single time entry by ID

patch.description:
Update a time entry
- Only freelancer can update their own entries
- Only 'draft' entries can be edited

delete.description:
Delete a time entry
- Only draft entries can be deleted
- Only freelancer can delete their own entries

post.description:
Submit time entries for approval
- Only freelancer can submit their own entries
- Only 'draft' entries can be submitted
- Entries must belong to the same contract (optional validation, but good practice)

Approve time entries and generate invoice
- Only client can approve
- Only 'submitted' entries can be approved
- Generates an invoice for the total amount

Reject time entries
- Only client can reject
- Returns entries to 'rejected' status (or 'draft'?) -> usually rejected so they can be fixed or deleted
Create a new invoice. Freelancers create invoices for their contracts.

get.description: List invoices with filters. Freelancers see invoices they created, clients see invoices sent to them.

patch.description: Update invoice details. Only freelancer (creator) can update pending invoices.

delete.description: Delete an invoice. Only pending invoices can be deleted.

patch.description: Mark invoice as paid. Only clients can pay invoices.

post.description: Fund escrow for a contract. Clients fund escrow to secure payment.

get.description: List escrow records. Clients see escrow they funded, freelancers see escrow for their contracts.

schema.title: Response List Escrow Api Escrow  Get

get.description: Check escrow balance for a contract.

post.description: Release escrow funds to freelancer.
Refund escrow to client. Admin or client can refund.

patch.description: Update escrow details. Only client can update active escrow.

post.description:
Create a new category
- Admin only
- Auto-generates slug from name
- Supports parent-child hierarchy

schema.title: Response Create Category Api Categories  Post

get.description:
List all categories
- Public endpoint
- Supports filtering by parent
- Returns flat list

schema.title: Response List Categories Api Categories  Get

get.description:
Get hierarchical category tree
- Returns nested structure with children
- Public endpoint

schema.title: Response Get Category Tree Api Categories Tree Get
Response Get Category Api Categories  Slug  Get

patch.description:
Update a category
- Admin only
- Can update name, description, icon, parent, sort order, active status

schema.title: Response Update Category Api Categories  Category Id  Patch

delete.description:
Delete a category
- Admin only
- Cannot delete if has child categories or projects

post.description:
Create a new tag
- Any authenticated user can create tags
- Auto-generates slug from name
- Prevents duplicates

schema.title: Response Create Tag Api Tags  Post

get.description:
List all tags
- Public endpoint
- Supports filtering by type
- Supports search by name

schema.title: Response List Tags Api Tags  Get
Response Get Popular Tags Api Tags Popular Get
Response Get Tag Api Tags  Slug  Get

patch.description:
Update a tag
- Admin only
- Can update name and type

schema.title: Response Update Tag Api Tags  Tag Id  Patch

delete.description:
Delete a tag
- Admin only
- Also removes all project associations

post.description:
Add tag to project
- Project owner or admin can add tags

delete.description:
Remove tag from project
- Project owner or admin can remove tags

get.description: Get all tags for a project

schema.title: Response Get Project Tags Api Tags Projects  Project Id  Tags Get

post.description:
Add item to favorites
- Users can favorite projects or freelancers
- Prevents duplicate favorites

schema.title: Response Create Favorite Api Favorites  Post

get.description:
List user's favorites
- Returns user's bookmarked items
- Can filter by type (project/freelancer)

schema.title: Response List Favorites Api Favorites  Get
Response Delete Favorite Api Favorites  Favorite Id  Delete

delete.description: Remove item from favorites by type and ID

schema.title: Response Remove Favorite By Target Api Favorites Remove  Target Type   Target Id  Delete

post.description:
Create a new support ticket
- Any authenticated user can create tickets
- Status defaults to 'open'

get.description:
List support tickets
- Users see only their own tickets
- Admins see all tickets or assigned tickets

parameters.name: assigned_to_me

schema.description: Show tickets assigned to me (admin only)
schema.title: Assigned To Me

parameters.description: Show tickets assigned to me (admin only)

get.description: Get a support ticket by ID

patch.description:
Update a support ticket
- Users can update their own open tickets
- Admins can update any ticket

delete.description:
Delete a support ticket
- Admin only

post.description:
Assign ticket to support agent
- Admin only

Resolve a support ticket
- Admin or assigned agent can resolve

Close a support ticket
- Ticket creator or admin can close
Create a refund request. Users can request refunds for payments they made.

get.description: List refunds. Users see refunds they requested, admins see all.

patch.description: Update refund details. User can update their own pending refunds, admin can update any.

delete.description: Delete a refund request. User can delete their own pending refunds, admin can delete any.

post.description: Approve a refund request. Admin only.
Reject a refund request. Admin only.
Process an approved refund. Admin only. Transfers money back to requester.

Advanced project search with full-text search and filters

Features:
- Full-text search using Turso FTS5
- Relevance ranking
- Category, budget, and experience filters
- Fast performance with indexed search

Advanced freelancer search with full-text search and filters

Features:
- Search across name, bio, skills, location
- FTS5 relevance ranking
- Hourly rate and location filters
- Skill matching

get.description:
Global search across projects, freelancers, and skills
- Returns mixed results from all searchable entities
- Public endpoint

Get search analytics (admin only)

Returns:
- Total searches
- Popular search terms
- Zero-result queries
- Average results per search

post.description:
Reindex all searchable content (admin only)

Rebuilds FTS5 indexes for:
- Projects
- Users (freelancers)
- Skills

get.description:
Unified search across all entity types

Returns combined results from projects, freelancers, and skills

parameters.name: types

schema.description: Search types: all, projects, freelancers, skills
schema.title: Types

parameters.description: Search types: all, projects, freelancers, skills

get.description: Get list of currently online users
Check if a specific user is online

post.description:
Send a real-time notification to a user
(Internal API for server-side notification triggers)

Broadcast a notification to all connected users
(Admin only - would require authentication in production)

get.description:
Get AI-powered freelancer recommendations for a project

Uses ML algorithms to match:
- Skill compatibility (30% weight)
- Historical success rate (20% weight)
- Average ratings (15% weight)
- Budget alignment (15% weight)
- Experience level match (10% weight)
- Current availability (5% weight)
- Response rate (5% weight)

Returns ranked list of freelancers with match scores and explanations

Get AI-powered project recommendations for the current freelancer

Returns projects that best match the freelancer's:
- Skills and expertise
- Experience level
- Hourly rate expectations
- Availability
- Historical success in similar projects

Get detailed match score between a specific project and freelancer

Returns:
- Overall match score (0.0 to 1.0)
- Breakdown of individual factors
- Weights used in calculation
- Explanation of score

post.description:
Track when a user clicks on a recommendation

This data is used to improve the ML matching algorithm over time

get.description:
Get information about the matching algorithm

Returns:
- Algorithm version
- Factors used
- Weights applied
- Description of methodology
Get user registration trends over a specified time period. Admin only.

get.description: Get revenue statistics for a date range. Admin only.
Get revenue trends over time. Admin only.

get.description: Get top performing freelancers. Admin only.

schema.title: Response Get Top Freelancers Api Analytics Freelancers Top Get

Get top clients by spending. Admin only.

schema.title: Response Get Top Clients Api Analytics Clients Top Get

get.description: Get platform health metrics. Admin only.
Get user engagement metrics. Admin only.
Get comprehensive dashboard summary. Admin only.

Get ML-powered revenue forecast.

Uses time series analysis to predict future revenue with confidence intervals.
Admin only endpoint.

Get revenue breakdown by category, type, and source.

Admin only endpoint.

Perform cohort analysis for user retention.

Tracks how user cohorts behave over time periods.
Admin only endpoint.

Get churn predictions for users.

Uses ML model to predict which users are at risk of churning.
Admin only endpoint (unless checking own prediction).

Get market trends for skills and categories.

Analyzes demand patterns and pricing trends.

Get comprehensive platform health metrics.

Includes user engagement, activity levels, and conversion rates.
Admin only endpoint.

Get combined analytics dashboard data.

Returns key metrics for admin dashboard in single request.
Admin only endpoint.

post.description:
Generate custom analytics report.

Admin only endpoint.

Upload user avatar image.

- **max_size**: 5MB

- **max_size**: 10MB

- **max_size**: 10MB

get.description:
Get AI-powered freelancer matches for a project

- **project_id**: ID of the project
- **limit**: Maximum number of matches to return

post.description:
Get AI-powered price estimation for a project

- **category**: Project category
- **skills_required**: List of required skills
- **description**: Project description
- **estimated_hours**: Estimated hours (optional)
- **complexity**: simple, moderate, complex, or expert

get.description:
Get AI-powered rate estimation for a freelancer

- **freelancer_id**: ID of the freelancer
- **years_experience**: Years of professional experience
- **skills**: List of skills
- **completed_projects**: Number of completed projects
- **average_rating**: Average client rating

Requires admin privileges or own user

- **project_id**: ID of the project to analyze

Analyze proposal for suspicious activity

- **proposal_id**: ID of the proposal to analyze

- activate: Activate suspended users
- suspend: Suspend user accounts
- send_message: Send message to multiple users
- update_role: Bulk role update

post.description:
Save a search query for later use.

- **name**: Display name for the saved search
- **category**: Search category (projects, freelancers, etc.)
- **criteria**: Search filters (keywords, budget range, skills, etc.)
- **is_alert**: Enable email notifications for new matches
- **alert_frequency**: How often to check for new matches

get.description:
Get all saved searches for the current user.

Optional filters:
- **category**: Filter by search category
- **alerts_only**: Only return searches with alerts enabled
Get a specific saved search by ID.

post.description:
Execute a saved search and return results.

This runs the search with the saved criteria and returns matching items.

Enable or disable alerts for a saved search.

- **enable**: True to enable, False to disable
- **frequency**: How often to send alerts (daily, weekly, instant)

get.description: Get all saved searches with alerts enabled.

post.description: Record a search in user's history.

Get predefined search templates.

Templates provide common search patterns like:
- High Budget Projects

post.description:
Create a saved search from a predefined template.

- **category**: Template category
- **template_name**: Name of the template to use
- **custom_name**: Optional custom name for the saved search

Get search analytics for the current user.

post.description:
Create a new API key.

 **Important**: The full API key is only shown once. Save it securely!

**Scopes**:
- `read` - Read-only access
- `write` - Create and update resources
- `delete` - Delete resources
- `projects` - Access project endpoints
- `users` - Access user endpoints
- `payments` - Access payment endpoints
- `analytics` - Access analytics endpoints
- `webhooks` - Manage webhooks
- `admin` - Full administrative access

**Tiers**:
- `free` - 60 req/min, 1,000 req/day
- `basic` - 300 req/min, 10,000 req/day
- `premium` - 1,000 req/min, 100,000 req/day
- `enterprise` - 5,000 req/min, 1,000,000 req/day

get.description:
List all API keys for the current user.

Note: Full API keys are never shown after creation.
Only the key prefix is displayed for identification.
Get all available API scopes and tiers.
Get details of a specific API key.

put.description:
Update an API key's settings.

You can update:
- name
- description
- scopes (permissions)
- ip_whitelist

delete.description:
Revoke an API key.

This immediately invalidates the key. Any requests using this key
will be rejected with a 401 error.

post.description:
Rotate an API key.

This creates a new key with the same settings and schedules
the old key for revocation in 24 hours. This allows time to
update your applications with the new key.

 **Important**: Save the new API key! It's only shown once.

get.description:
Get usage statistics for an API key.

Returns:
- Total requests made
- Requests today
- Requests this minute
- Rate limit remaining
- Last used timestamp

post.description:
Validate an API key.

This endpoint can be used to verify if an API key is valid
and check its permissions without making an authenticated request.

Returns validation status and remaining rate limits.

get.description: Get information about rate limit tiers.
Get API key best practices and security recommendations.

Cannot delete the current version.

Creates a new version with the old content.

Returns size diff and metadata comparison.

Lock a file for exclusive editing.

Lock expires after 30 minutes.

Create a custom field definition.

**Field Types:**
- `text` - Single line text
- `textarea` - Multi-line text
- `number` - Numeric value
- `integer` - Whole number
- `decimal` - Decimal number
- `boolean` - True/false
- `date` - Date (YYYY-MM-DD)
- `datetime` - Date and time
- `email` - Email address
- `url` - Web URL
- `phone` - Phone number
- `select` - Single selection (requires options)
- `multiselect` - Multiple selection (requires options)
- `checkbox` - Checkbox
- `radio` - Radio buttons (requires options)
- `currency` - Currency value
- `percentage` - Percentage (0-100)
- `json` - JSON data
- `file` - File reference

post.description:
CLIENT AI COPILOT: Convert natural language project description to structured spec.

Takes a free-form project description and extracts:
- Project title and formatted description
- Category and subcategory
- Required skills
- Experience level
- Budget range
- Suggested milestones
- Feasibility analysis

FREELANCER AI COPILOT: Generate a tailored proposal for a project.

Reads project requirements and freelancer profile to create:
- Personalized cover letter
- Proposed milestones and timeline
- Suggested rate

Returns:
- SEO-optimized title
- Enhanced description
- Suggested improvements
